channel.title: Jackfrost's isle v1.0
channel.description:
jackfrosts isle development
features: c-wars pc (fully working) real defenders fully working have to kill lvl 76 giants to get drop real 99 skill capes just fixed maybe some errors though my own island that i made with fantastic starting place full wild system full varrock full fally full camelot full npcs! 30 shops in ardougne with random items pkbox mod island great! full barrows
more to come: more minigames more full places and new dark bow with dragon arrows
credits to: xpk10wnagex for codeing and 60% for helpin coding bringing ideas started from a basic source!
post to see what i could add!
thanks matt.

yer i ment 460 but the lowest is like 457 for skill capes so this guy has no life… why bother to make stuff up if he dosnt even show pictures
